document_data.name: How to Track an Illithid
document_data.author: [[Golbraith Stredivas]]
document_data.mainbody: '''''How to Track an Illithid''''' was a hand-written [[book]] penned by [[Golbraith Stredivas]], friend and confidant of Duke [[Abdel Adrian]], published sometime in or before the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Content: The book collected numerous methods used to track down the dreaded [[mind flayer]]s. Each of the methods was well detailed and tested, with each endeavor's outcome painstakingly documented by Golbraith.
document_data.History: In the {{YearlinkName|1492}}, the original tome of ''How to Track an Illithid'' could be found in the home of Golbraith Stredivas in [[Baldur's Gate]]'s [[Lower City]].
